Question
========

Given the following 16 outcomes of a sampling: 21, 26, 18, 17, 24, 33, 37, 30, 24, 28, 24, 31, 35, 29, 18, 21. The median of these 16 numbers is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 24
* 25
* 26
* 27

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 24: Incorrect
* 25: Correct
* 26: Incorrect
* 27: Incorrect
